info.name: Stay put, GOG nav-bar!
info.description: Keeps GOG.com's main nav-bar at the top and prevents it from following you down pages as you browse. Fully compatible with Barefoot Essentials.
info.additionalInfo: Inspired by Raina's now-defunct style, Style 63161, my updated style directly answers this requested site feature on GOG's Wishlist. Unlike our previous attempts to keep GOG's nav-bar on top of the page, however, this style does not have any known scrolling or page-width issues with either Chrome or Firefox, and should work on any screen. If you encounter a problem of any kind, however, wish to make a request, or have any feedback whatsoever, I'd love to hear from you. Click my name above to see how you can contact me.
